Package panama.core

Contains all core classes of the framework.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
BaseController Base class for all controllers.
Context Provides methods to access application scope, session scope, request scope and parameters.
Dispatcher The main dispatcher, implemented as a filter.
ExternalTemplateTarget Use this to render a template other than a Velocity template.
HttpMultipartServletRequest A MultiPartServletRequest using commons-fileupload API.
JsonTarget Converts the specified json to a string and writes it as response.
NullTarget A target that goes nowhere.
PlainTextTarget Simply writes the specified text as response.
RedirectTarget  
RequestWrapper Wrapper for easy fix of character encoding and for extended Locale support.
SystemController An internal controller providing actions to gather some information.
Target Targets are returned by Controller#render() and Controller#redirect() The target is interpreted by the Dispatcher
TemplateTarget Use this to render a Velocity template.
Version This class contains the current version of Panama.
 

Package panama.core Description

Contains all core classes of the framework.
